title: EXPENDITURE REPORTS CONCERNING OFFICIAL FOREIGN TRAVEL

content.text:
Reports concerning the foreign currencies and U.S. dollars utilized 
for Official Foreign Travel during the fourth quarter of 2016 and the 
third and fourth quarters of 2017, pursuant to Public Law 95-384 are as 
follows:
